titles.title: Increasing Access to Dental Insurance Act
Increasing Access to Dental Insurance Act
A bill to allow additional individuals to enroll in standalone dental plans offered through Federal Exchanges.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Increasing Access to Dental Insurance Act
This bill permits individuals to enroll in a dental benefits plan on a health insurance exchange without also enrolling in a qualified health plan.
